summary: Completed comprehensive E2E testing of CareerIQ V3.0 flow. All backend APIs working correctly (26/26 tests passed). Frontend pages (Landing, Order, Report) load and function properly. Pricing: ₹2,999 entry tier, ₹1,499 upsell to complete intelligence (₹4,498 total). UTM tracking working. Existing session (f1c5ba1b-d360-49e6-b84c-31e4e467540e) with tier 2999 shows Career Diagnosis and Risk Assessment sections correctly, with upsell section showing 'Unlock Complete Intelligence' for ₹1,499.

critical_code_review_comments: All integrations are REAL (OpenAI, Razorpay, SendGrid) - no mocked APIs
Backend version 3.1 with proper health checks
UTM tracking implemented correctly with localStorage persistence
Report page correctly shows tier-appropriate content (Diagnosis + Risk for ₹2,999)
Upsell section correctly calculates upgrade amount (₹4,498 - ₹2,999 = ₹1,499)
Processing page has 5-step backend-driven progress system
All data-testid attributes present for testing
